key.name: matugen-path
key.description: Absolute path to the matugen binary used to generate Material You color palettes.

key.name: matugen-flavor
key.description: Value passed to matugen --type (for example scheme-tonal-spot, scheme-vibrant).

key.name: matugen-config
key.description: Optional path to a matugen configuration file that will be supplied via --config.

key.name: color-mode
key.description: Controls whether the extension runs matugen in light or dark mode (accepted values: light, dark).
